UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A Bifunctional Synthetic Peptide With Antimicrobial and Plant Elicitation Properties That Protect Tomato Plants From Bacterial and Fungal Infections.
Literature.Author: Montesinos L, Gascón B, Ruz L, Badosa E, Planas M, Feliu L, Montesinos E

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Xanthomonas campestris pv. Vesicatoria Xcv 206(MIC=>100µM),Pseudomonas syringae pv. tomato DC3000(MIC=>100µM),Botrytis cinerea(MIC=>100µM)
